name: Stronger To Gather (Cedar Cat Studios)
description:
Stronger To Gather

The big village feast is tonight and you do NOT want to run errands for Momma Bear like you always have done in the past. You took a nap in the middle of preparations, but Momma Bear saw right through your ploy and is having you gather the final ingredients for the final dish. 

Since you were sleeping so long though you have are pretty weak... You will need to be stronger to gather the remaining ingredients. 

On your journey you will find an ensemble of quirky characters while you explore the Quirky Island.
